about_the_game:
Welcome to Worldwide Battle Royale, the ultimate multiplayer third-person battle royale game that brings together a realistic world, iconic maps, and famous characters! Step into the fray and compete against players from across the globe as you fight for survival and strive to become the last person standing.

Explore vast and immersive play areas set in meticulously crafted realistic environments. From sprawling cities to dense forests, desolate deserts to icy tundras, each map offers its own unique challenges and strategic opportunities. Utilize the terrain, seek cover, and outsmart your opponents as you navigate through dynamic landscapes that demand both skill and adaptability.

What sets Worldwide Battle Royale apart is the inclusion of legendary characters from various walks of life. Play as renowned heroes, adventurers, and even historical figures, each with their own distinct abilities, strengths, and play styles. Whether you prefer the agility of a nimble assassin, the brute strength of a mighty warrior, or the tactical prowess of a cunning strategist, there's a character perfectly suited to your preferred playstyle.

Engage in heart-pounding battles with up to 20 players in free-for-all arenas. Form alliances, forge rivalries, or go it alone as you scavenge for weapons, armor, and resources to bolster your chances of survival. The intense combat mechanics, coupled with the unpredictable nature of the battlefield, will keep you on the edge of your seat as you make split-second decisions and engage in adrenaline-fueled firefights.

Compete on a global scale as you climb the ranks, earn prestigious rewards, and showcase your skills to the world.
Prepare for an epic battle unlike any other in Worldwide Battle Royale. Join the fray, conquer the competition, and emerge as the ultimate champion in this thrilling multiplayer third-person battle royale game that combines realism, iconic maps, and famous characters for an unforgettable gaming experience. Are you ready to stake your claim in the worldwide arena?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i3 processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs (NVidia or AMD)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs (NVidia or AMD)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Battle royale game with realistic world maps and characters.
